named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_BY_USER_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT customer FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Customer customer WHERE customer.username = :username

named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_BY_EMAIL
named-query.query: SELECT customer FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Customer customer WHERE customer.emailAddress = :email
